casebody.data:
Simuel
v.
Stephens, et al. 491P02-7 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016

Mr. Dontez L. Simuel, Pro se.

Ms. Laura Edwards Parker, Assistant Attorney General, For Stephens, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of April 2016 by Plaintiff for Writ of Prohibition:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
